texts.name: Sun Xiao Hou
texts.biography: Sun Xiao Hou is a monkey from the Waterfall Cave. His ambition is to become a great monkey as the Monkey King Sun Wukong.

specialty.description:
{Monkeys and Monkey Elders}

Increases Speed of any Monkeys or Monkey Elders by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 2 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Monkeys
